description: Erection of single storey rear extension and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 3 no. rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A, B & C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details have been assessed by relevant consultants and are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details, in relation to Condition 4 (Details of Materials) of planning permission 21/03620/HOU, which states:Condition 4 (Details of Materials) - Prior to the commencement of the development hereby approved, the following details shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, implemented prior to occupation and thereafter permanently retained:(a) materials for all external finishes and window frames (including their manufacturer's specification, colour and texture).The development shall then be carried out in strict accordance with the approved samples.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policyD4 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Tree photos - Please email us clear photos of each tree and any key features you wish to draw to the attention of the Tree Officer to be considered in your application. Photos should be labelled T.1, T.2 and so on, in order that they can be identified according to the list of works you have provided and the corresponding numbered plan showing the location of each tree. This will enable the Council to provide you with a more prompt decision.
